Entry.JapaneseText: [VARIABLE]
Entry.EnglishText: [VARIABLE]

Entry.JapaneseText: <Mao>
Entry.EnglishText: <Mao>

Entry.JapaneseText: <Veigue>
Entry.EnglishText: <Veigue>

Entry.JapaneseText: ハック
Entry.EnglishText: Hack

Entry.JapaneseText: <Eugene>
Entry.EnglishText: <Eugene>

Entry.JapaneseText: <Tytree>
Entry.EnglishText: <Tytree>

Entry.JapaneseText: <Annie>
Entry.EnglishText: <Annie>

Entry.JapaneseText: <Claire>
Entry.EnglishText: <Claire>

Entry.JapaneseText: <Hilda>
Entry.EnglishText: <Hilda>

Entry.JapaneseText: notice
Entry.EnglishText: Notice

Entry.JapaneseText: select
Entry.EnglishText: Select

Entry.JapaneseText: メセチナ洞窟
Entry.EnglishText: Mesechina Cavern

Entry.JapaneseText: メセチナ洞窟
Entry.EnglishText: Mesechina Cavern

Entry.JapaneseText: た、助けてー!!
Entry.EnglishText: H-Help me!

Entry.JapaneseText: ……もしかして、 あれがハック？
Entry.EnglishText: ...Is that Hack?

Entry.JapaneseText: 行くぞ……!!
Entry.EnglishText: Let's go!

Entry.JapaneseText: 大丈夫か？
Entry.EnglishText: Are you all right?

Entry.JapaneseText: あ、ありがとう！ 助かったよ……でも…… キミたちはここに何をしに……？
Entry.EnglishText: T-Thank you! You really saved my hide... But... why are you here?

Entry.JapaneseText: ジベールさんに頼まれて来た。 あんたがハックだな？
Entry.EnglishText: Mr. Gibert asked us to come here. You're Hack, right?

Entry.JapaneseText: ジベールさんに？
Entry.EnglishText: Mr. Gibert sent you?

Entry.JapaneseText: なかなかあんたが帰って来ないから、 ジベールさんが心配していた。 何をしていたんだ？
Entry.EnglishText: Mr. Gibert was worried because you've been gone for a while. What are you doing here?

Entry.JapaneseText: ごめんなさい…… ついつい調査に熱が入り過ぎてさ。 助けてくれてありがとう。 今のうちに引き上げる事にするよ。
Entry.EnglishText: I'm sorry... I got so absorbed in my research that I completely lost track of time. Thanks for saving me. I'll head back now!

Entry.JapaneseText: これで、ジベールさんに 信用してもらえるネ！
Entry.EnglishText: We should be able to earn Gibert's trust now!

Entry.JapaneseText: ああ、急いで戻ろう。
Entry.EnglishText: Right, let's hurry back.

Entry.JapaneseText: <Eugene>!! <Veigue>と<Tytree>が 来てくれたヨ!! さぁ、出てきてよ！
Entry.EnglishText: <Eugene>! <Veigue> and <Tytree> are here! You can come on out now!

Entry.JapaneseText: だめだ!! 開けるな!!
Entry.EnglishText: No! Don't open the gate!

Entry.JapaneseText: <Eugene>……
Entry.EnglishText: <Eugene>...

Entry.JapaneseText: どうしたんだ？ なんでこんなところに……？
Entry.EnglishText: What's wrong? Why is he in there...?

Entry.JapaneseText: ……<Veigue>、<Tytree>…… 今すぐ俺を殺せ！
Entry.EnglishText: <Veigue>, <Tytree>... I need you to kill me, right now!

Entry.JapaneseText: ちょっと待って、<Eugene>！ <Veigue>たちを呼んで来てくれって、 そういうコトだったの!?
Entry.EnglishText: Whoa, <Eugene>, wait! You called <Veigue> and the others all the way here for that?!

Entry.JapaneseText: そうだ……早く、一刻も早く…… 俺を殺すんだ……頼む…… <Annie>に仇を……
Entry.EnglishText: That's right... Hurry, don't hesitate for even a second... Kill me... Please... Give Annie her revenge...

Entry.JapaneseText: 冗談じゃねえ!! 一緒に戦った仲間を 殺せるワケねえだろうが!!
Entry.EnglishText: Is this some kinda sick joke?! No way am I gonna kill a friend who fought by my side!

Entry.JapaneseText: 俺の心は憎しみで乱れている…… このままでは、俺は……おまえたち ヒューマを殺してしまう……!!
Entry.EnglishText: Hatred is eating away at my mind... If this continues, then I... I'll end up killing you Huma!

Entry.JapaneseText: 限界だ……殺してくれ…… 俺を早く殺さないと…… 俺が、おまえらを……殺す…… 殺してやる!!
Entry.EnglishText: I can't hold out much longer... Kill me... If you don't do it soon, I...I'm going to...kill you all... I'll kill you!

Entry.JapaneseText: 落ち着け、<Eugene>!!
Entry.EnglishText: Calm down, <Eugene>!

Entry.JapaneseText: 黙れ、脆弱なヒューマめ!! 消えろ！ 消えてしまえ!! うおおおおおおぉぉぉッ!!
Entry.EnglishText: Shut up, you pathetic Huma! Die! Begone from this world! Uuuoooooh!

Entry.JapaneseText: <Eugene>!!
Entry.EnglishText: <Eugene>!

Entry.JapaneseText: みなさん、いったん外へ！
Entry.EnglishText: We need to get out of here!

Entry.JapaneseText: <Mao>、危険だ！
Entry.EnglishText: <Mao>, it's dangerous!

Entry.JapaneseText: でも……！
Entry.EnglishText: But...!

Entry.JapaneseText: いったん外へ出て、 どうすればいいか考えるんだ！
Entry.EnglishText: Let's get out of here for now, and then we can think about what to do.

Entry.JapaneseText: ……わかったよ……
Entry.EnglishText: ...Okay...

Entry.JapaneseText: 大丈夫、<Eugene>!? もう少しの辛抱だからね!! <Veigue>たちが薬を持って 来てくれるから、がんばって!!
Entry.EnglishText: Are you alright, <Eugene>?! Just hang in there a little while longer! <Veigue> and the others are gonna bring you medicine!

Entry.JapaneseText: <Eugene>!! <Veigue>たちが 薬を持って来てくれたヨ!! もう安心だからさ……
Entry.EnglishText: <Eugene>! <Veigue> and the others came back with the medicine! Everything's gonna be okay now...

Entry.JapaneseText: <Eugene>……お願いだから…… 出てきてよ……
Entry.EnglishText: <Eugene>, please... Come out of there!

Entry.JapaneseText: <Eugene>!!
Entry.EnglishText: <Eugene>!

Entry.JapaneseText: <Eugene>!!
Entry.EnglishText: <Eugene>!

Entry.JapaneseText: しっかりしろ!!
Entry.EnglishText: Just hold on.

Entry.JapaneseText: <Eugene>、飲んで…… コレを飲めば、元に戻れるから……
Entry.EnglishText: <Eugene>, take this. You just need to take this and you'll be back to normal...

Entry.JapaneseText: <Eugene>？
Entry.EnglishText: <Eugene>!

Entry.JapaneseText: ……憎い……憎い…… ヒューマは……殺す!!
Entry.EnglishText: I hate... I hate you... I'll kill you Huma!

Entry.JapaneseText: うあっ!!
Entry.EnglishText: Uaah!!

Entry.JapaneseText: おわああああッ!!
Entry.EnglishText: Aaahh!!

Entry.JapaneseText: うわーッ!!
Entry.EnglishText: Uwaahh!!

Entry.JapaneseText: <Mao>ッ!!
Entry.EnglishText: <Mao>!

Entry.JapaneseText: ぐあああああああああッ!!
Entry.EnglishText: Guuaaahh!!

Entry.JapaneseText: <Eugene>!!
Entry.EnglishText: <Eugene>!

Entry.JapaneseText: ダメ!! 錯乱してるわ!! なんとかして止めないと!!
Entry.EnglishText: This is bad! He's completely out of control! We have to do something to stop him!

Entry.JapaneseText: 戦うしかない!!
Entry.EnglishText: We have no choice but to fight!

Entry.JapaneseText: そんなのヤダよ!!
Entry.EnglishText: No, we can't!!

Entry.JapaneseText: このままだと私たち、 <Eugene>に殺されちゃうわよ!?
Entry.EnglishText: If we don't do anything, Eugene is going to kill us all!

Entry.JapaneseText: でもォ!!
Entry.EnglishText: But...!

Entry.JapaneseText: 気を失わせるだけでいい!! 戦え、<Mao>!!
Entry.EnglishText: All we have to do is knock him out! You need to fight him, <Mao>!

Entry.JapaneseText: ぐあああああああああッ!!
Entry.EnglishText: Guuaaahh!!

Entry.JapaneseText: ……ゲオルギアスよりも やっかいだったぜ。
Entry.EnglishText: That was tougher than going up against Geyorkias.

Entry.JapaneseText: <Mao>、今のうちに薬を。
Entry.EnglishText: <Mao>, give him the medicine while you have the chance!

Entry.JapaneseText: ぐふっ、ごほっ……!!
Entry.EnglishText: Ghh, cough...!!

Entry.JapaneseText: <Eugene>、飲んで…… お願い……<Annie>たちが 持って来てくれた……薬……
Entry.EnglishText: <Eugene>, take it... Please... Annie and the others went and got it for you...

Entry.JapaneseText: ……どう？
Entry.EnglishText: ...Well?

Entry.JapaneseText: ……苦い。
Entry.EnglishText: ...It's bitter.

Entry.JapaneseText: そうじゃなくて、効いた？
Entry.EnglishText: Not that! I was asking you if it worked!

Entry.JapaneseText: ……ああ、たぶんな……
Entry.EnglishText: ...Yeah, I think so...

Entry.JapaneseText: よかったぁ……よかったネ…… うわーん!!
Entry.EnglishText: I'm so glad... Thank goodness... Wahaaah!!

Entry.JapaneseText: <Eugene>がいなくなっちゃったら どうしようかと思ったんだから!! だってボク……ボク……!!
Entry.EnglishText: I don't know what I would do if I were to lose you, <Eugene>! So I... I...

Entry.JapaneseText: <Mao>……
……そうか。 やはり、俺以外にも 変化が起こっていたか……
Entry.EnglishText: ...I see. So I'm not the only one who's had something happen to them.

Entry.JapaneseText: 何か心当たりがあったのか？
Entry.EnglishText: Do you have any idea what could have happened?

Entry.JapaneseText: ……俺は今まで、種族というくくりで 相手に憎しみを抱いた事はなかった。 しかし、あの儀式の後から 俺の精神は常に高ぶっていたんだ。
Entry.EnglishText: My whole life, I had never felt any hatred towards anyone based on their race. However, after the ritual, I felt like I was constantly on edge.

Entry.JapaneseText: ゲオルギアスとの死闘の影響で 興奮がおさまらないのだろうと 思っていた……
Entry.EnglishText: I had thought that perhaps I was still worked up after that intense battle against Geyorkias.

Entry.JapaneseText: だが……違った…… ヒューマを見るたび、話すたび、 ひとつの感情が俺の心を支配した。 ヒューマが憎い……奴らを殺せと!!
Entry.EnglishText: But... I was wrong. Every time I saw a Huma or talked to one, there was only one thing on my mind.--that I hate Huma, and that I ought to kill them!

Entry.JapaneseText: いくら考えても、急な変化の 原因の心当たりはなかった。 だが……
Entry.EnglishText: No matter how hard I thought about it, I couldn't think of a reason for my sudden change in attitude. However...

Entry.JapaneseText: ゲオルギアスが復活した時のコト 覚えてる？ あの時、ゲオルギアスは 自分の使命はヒューマのせん滅だって 言ったよネ？
Entry.EnglishText: Do you remember when Geyorkias was revived? He said that his mission was to eradicate Huma, didn't he?

Entry.JapaneseText: それが今回のヒューマへの憎しみと どう関係しているのかはわからない。
Entry.EnglishText: I'm not sure how that would have anything to do with my sudden hatred for Huma...

Entry.JapaneseText: だが俺の異変は あの儀式の後に起こった事だ。 何かゲオルギアスと 関連があるのかもしれない。
Entry.EnglishText: But there might indeed be some sort of connection, considering that I started behaving abnormally after the ritual.

Entry.JapaneseText: ……ゲオルギアスね。 調べてみたけど……お手上げ。 ほとんど情報はなし。
Entry.EnglishText: Geyorkias, huh... I tried doing some research, but I've given up. There's practically no information about him.

Entry.JapaneseText: 俺たちもあの儀式の後、 ゲオルギアスの名前が 気になって調べてみたんだ。
Entry.EnglishText: We were also curious about him, so we decided to look into it ourselves.

Entry.JapaneseText: 前にこの洞窟で助けた ハックっていう考古学の勉強を してた人がいたでしょ？
Entry.EnglishText: You know how that guy we rescued in these caverns, Hack, was doing some archaelogical research here?

Entry.JapaneseText: あの人が<Blue>聖なる王<White>の事を 話してたのを思い出して、 聞きに行ってみたんだヨ。
Entry.EnglishText: Well, we remembered how he mentioned something about a <Blue>Sacred King<White>, so we decided to go ask him about it.

Entry.JapaneseText: そしたらなんと、 この洞窟が<Blue>聖なる王<White>、 つまりゲオルギアスに ゆかりのある場所だって。
Entry.EnglishText: Apparently the <Blue>Sacred King<White>, who we now know is Geyorkias, has some kind of connection to these caverns.

Entry.JapaneseText: ……まさに調査を始めようとした 矢先に、俺がああなった。
Entry.EnglishText: ...Just as we were about to begin conducting our investigation, I started having problems.

Entry.JapaneseText: それで、俺はこの洞窟にこもったんだ。 誰かを殺してしまう前に…… 俺を殺してくれる相手が来るのを 待つために……
Entry.EnglishText: That's why I had locked myself away in the caverns. I was waiting for someone who could come and kill me... Before I killed anyone myself.

Entry.JapaneseText: よって、調査の方は まだほとんど手付かずだ。
Entry.EnglishText: We made little progress in our investigation because of that.

Entry.JapaneseText: じゃあ、早速、調査再開ね。
Entry.EnglishText: Well, let's give it another shot then, shall we?

Entry.JapaneseText: <Green><scale:140><speed:0><font:80000002><unk19:340480>が仲間になりました。
Entry.EnglishText: <Green><scale:140><speed:0><unk19:340480> joined the party.

Entry.JapaneseText: <Green><scale:140><speed:0><font:80000002><unk19:341080>が同行します。
Entry.EnglishText: <Green><scale:140><speed:0><unk19:341080> is now travelling with you.

Entry.JapaneseText: 俺の心は憎しみで乱れている…… このままでは、俺は……おまえたち ヒューマを殺してしまう……!!
Entry.EnglishText: Hatred is eating away at my mind... If this continues, then I... I'll end up killing you Huma!

Entry.JapaneseText: ……違う…… あなたは違うでしょ!? そうじゃないの!?
Entry.EnglishText: No...! You would never do something like that! Isn't that right?!
Entry.Notes: I changed "am I not right" to "isn't that right." because it flows better -dragon

Entry.JapaneseText: 黙れ、脆弱なヒューマめ!! 消えろ！ 消えてしまえ!! うおおおおおおぉぉぉッ!!
Entry.EnglishText: Shut up, you pathetic Huma! Die! Begone from this world! Uuuoooooh!

Entry.JapaneseText: は、早く…… ラジルダへ行って秘薬を…… <Eugene>……さんのために……
Entry.EnglishText: Quick... Go to Razilda and get the medicine for... Mr. <Eugene>.

Entry.JapaneseText: ナニやってるの!? 早くラジルダの秘薬を 持ってきてヨ!!
Entry.EnglishText: Don't just stand there!! Hurry up and get me the medicine from Razilda!

Entry.JapaneseText: <Eugene>が……<Eugene>を 早く助けてあげなきゃ……!!
Entry.EnglishText: <Eugene> is... We have to hurry and save <Eugene>...!!

Entry.JapaneseText: ううぅ……憎い…… ヒューマが憎い……!!
Entry.EnglishText: Arggh... I hate... Huma... I hate...!!

Entry.JapaneseText: ぬぅぅぅ…… うおぉぉぉぉぉッ!!
Entry.EnglishText: Grrrr... Uooaargh!!!!

Entry.JapaneseText: 来るな…… 俺に近づくんじゃない!!
Entry.EnglishText: Stay back... Don't come close!!!

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0><scale:140>休憩しますか？ はい いいえ
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0><scale:140>Would you like to rest? Yes No
